thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 22 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Stepan Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.42

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Stepan Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.42
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Stepan Co:
* STEPAN REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND RECORD FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.06 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.42 * CURRENT YEAR ADJUSTED NET INCOME EXCLUDES A $14.9 MILLION NET AFTER-TAX CHARGE RELATED TO NEW U.S. TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT LEGISLATION
* QTRLY ‍NET SALES $473.8 MILLION VERSUS $420.6 MILLION​ * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.72, REVENUE VIEW $458.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* QTRLY NET SALES $473.8 MILLION VERSUS $420.6 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
